nodes.text: The Inyusu Tor mineral processing facility, also known as the Inyusu Tor refinery complex, was located at the top of the volcanic mountain Inyusu Tor on the planet Sullust. In 3 ABY, it was captured by the Alliance to Restore the Republic's 61st Mobile Infantry, who were unable to leave Sullust after their transport was shot down. They defended it from the Imperial forces on Sullust and came out victorious.
